name: Run Greyman Run!
description:
Title: Run Greyman Run!

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Your an alien on the run trying to go as far as you can on this odd world in this infinite runner. Increase your score by running for as long as you can.

Instructions: Use W to jump and collect blank to increase your score. if you fall too far back or fall of you lose. Press Enter to restart the game

Isaiah Altman - Game Developer
